content.text:
What is the capacity of the forward feed evaporator shown in <image 1> in the provided setup?

A. E1 + E2 + E3
B. E3
C. E1 
D. E1 + E2

The capacity of the forward feed evaporator is the sum of the capacities of the individual evaporators it is connected to, which in this case are E1 and E2. Therefore, the correct answer is D. E1 + E2.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
